00033 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::xmlOptions(){
00034 
00035   Network::GlobalURI gu;
00036   this->filename=gu.getUserDirFile("options.xml");
00037   doc=NULL;
00038   refresh();
00039 }

00045 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::~xmlOptions(){
00046   if (doc)
00047     delete doc;
00048 
00049   doc=NULL;
00050 }

00057 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::refresh(){
00058   LOGI("xmlOptions refresh function called");
00059   bool ret=false;
00060 
00061   if (loadDocument()){
00062     ret=true;
00063   }
00064   else{
00065     LOGE("Can not load the xml options");
00066     LOGCATS("Missing filename : '");
00067     LOGCATS(this->filename.c_str());
00068     LOGCATS("'");
00069     LOGCAT();
00070   }
00071   return ret;
00072 }

00081 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::loadDocument(){
00082   doc=new TiXmlDocument( this->filename.c_str() );
00083   bool ret=doc->LoadFile();
00084   root =doc->RootElement();
00085 
00086   return ret;
00087 }

00100 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00101 saveSnapshot(const char* snapName, tOptionPanelList* panels){
00102   LOGI("Saving snapshot");
00103 
00104   TiXmlElement *snapNode;
00105 
00106   // Remove it if it already exists
00107   if (isSnapShotExists(snapName)){
00108     snapNode=getSnapshotNode(snapName);
00109 
00110     // Remove all childs
00111     snapNode->Clear();
00112   }
00113   else{
00114     // SnapShot element
00115     snapNode=new TiXmlElement( "Snapshot" );
00116     snapNode->SetAttribute("name", snapName );
00117 
00118     root->LinkEndChild( snapNode );
00119   }
00120 
00121   // Iterate though panels
00122   tOptionPanelList::const_iterator iter;
00123   for (iter=panels->begin(); iter != panels->end(); iter++){
00124     savePanel( snapNode, (*iter) );
00125   }
00126 
00127   doc->SaveFile();
00128   return true;
00129 }

00140 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00141 savePanel(TiXmlElement* elem, OptionPanel* panel){
00142   LOGI("Adding panel :");
00143 
00144   TiXmlElement* panelNode=new TiXmlElement( "Panel" );
00145   panelNode->SetAttribute("name", panel->getCaption() );
00146 
00147 
00148   TiXmlNode* ret=elem->LinkEndChild( panelNode );
00149 
00150   // Iterate though panels
00151   tOptionButtonList::const_iterator iter;
00152   tOptionButtonList* lst =panel->getButtonList();
00153 
00154   for (iter=lst->begin(); iter != lst->end(); iter++){
00155     saveButton( panelNode, (*iter) );
00156   }
00157 
00158   if (!ret)
00159     LOGW("An error occured while adding panel");
00160 
00161 }

00172 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00173 saveButton(TiXmlElement* elem, OptionButton* button){
00174 
00175   TiXmlElement* btnNode=new TiXmlElement( "Button" );
00176   btnNode->SetAttribute("name", button->getCaption() );
00177 
00178 
00179   TiXmlNode* ret=elem->LinkEndChild( btnNode );
00180 
00181   // Iterate though panels
00182   tOptionAttributeList::const_iterator iter;
00183   tOptionAttributeList* lst=button->getAttributeList();
00184 
00185   for (iter=lst->begin(); iter != lst->end(); iter++){
00186     saveAttribute( btnNode, (*iter) );
00187   }
00188

00200 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00201 saveAttribute(TiXmlElement* elem, OptionAttribute* attrb){
00202   TiXmlElement* btnNode=new TiXmlElement( "Attribute" );
00203   btnNode->SetAttribute("name", attrb->getName() );
00204 
00205   LOGCATS("Attribute value :");
00206   LOGCATS(attrb->getValueStr());
00207   LOGCAT();
00208 
00209   TiXmlText* textNode=new TiXmlText( attrb->getValueStr() );
00210   btnNode->LinkEndChild( textNode );
00211   elem->LinkEndChild( btnNode );
00212 }

00219 RainbruRPG::Options::tSnapshotList* 
00220 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::getSnapshotList(){
00221 
00222 
00223   tSnapshotList* lst=new tSnapshotList();
00224 
00225   if (root){
00226     TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Snapshot" );
00227     if (childNode){
00228       TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00229 
00230       for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00231         lst->push_back(child->Attribute("name"));
00232       }
00233     }
00234     else{
00235       LOGW("Empty snapshot list");
00236       return NULL;
00237     }
00238   }
00239   else{
00240     LOGE("Can not get a valid root element");
00241     return NULL;
00242   }
00243 
00244   return lst;
00245 }

00255 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::isSnapShotExists(const char* c){
00256   bool ret=false;
00257 
00258   tSnapshotList::const_iterator iter;
00259   tSnapshotList* snapList=getSnapshotList();
00260 
00261   // populate the combo box
00262   if (snapList){
00263     for (iter=snapList->begin(); iter != snapList->end(); iter++){
00264       if (strcmp(c, (*iter))==0)
00265         ret=true;
00266     }
00267   }
00268 
00269   return ret;
00270 }

00279 TiXmlElement* RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00280 getSnapshotNode(const char* n){
00281 
00282   TiXmlElement* ret=NULL;
00283 
00284   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Snapshot" );
00285   if (childNode){
00286     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00287 
00288     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00289       const char* snapName=child->Attribute("name");
00290       if (strcmp(n, snapName)==0){
00291         ret=child;
00292       }
00293     }
00294   }
00295   return ret;
00296 }

00305 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00306 loadSnapshot(const char* name, tOptionPanelList* panels){
00307 
00308   TiXmlElement* snapNode= getSnapshotNode(name);
00309 
00310   if (snapNode){
00311 
00312   
00313     // Iterate through list of panels
00314     tOptionPanelList::const_iterator iter;
00315     for (iter=panels->begin(); iter != panels->end(); iter++){
00316 
00317       loadPanel(snapNode, (*iter));
00318     }
00319 
00320   }

00332 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00333 loadPanel(TiXmlElement* snapNode, OptionPanel* panel){
00334 
00335     
00336   // Get the xml node of the panel
00337   TiXmlNode* childNode = snapNode->FirstChild( "Panel" );
00338   if (childNode){
00339     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00340 
00341     // search the good panel    
00342     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00343       const char* panelName=child->Attribute("name");
00344 
00345       // We have the good panel (xml)
00346       if (strcmp(panelName, panel->getCaption())==0){
00347         
00348         tOptionButtonList* buttons=panel->getButtonList();
00349         tOptionButtonList::const_iterator iter2;
00350 
00351         // treat each button
00352         for (iter2=buttons->begin(); iter2 != buttons->end(); iter2++){
00353           
00354           loadButton(child, (*iter2));
00355           
00356         }
00357       }
00358     }
00359   }
00360 }

00368 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00369 loadButton(TiXmlElement* panelNode, OptionButton* button){
00370 
00371   // Get the xml node of the panel
00372   TiXmlNode* childNode = panelNode->FirstChild( "Button" );
00373   if (childNode){
00374     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00375 
00376     // search the good button
00377     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00378       const char* buttonName=child->Attribute("name");
00379 
00380       // We have the good button (xml)
00381       if (strcmp(buttonName, button->getCaption())==0){
00382 
00383 
00384         tOptionAttributeList* attrbs=button->getAttributeList();
00385         tOptionAttributeList::const_iterator iter2;
00386 
00387         // treat each button
00388         for (iter2=attrbs->begin(); iter2 != attrbs->end(); iter2++){
00389           
00390           loadAttribute(child, (*iter2));
00391           
00392         }
00393       }
00394     }
00395   }
00396 }

00403 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::
00404 loadAttribute(TiXmlElement* buttonNode , OptionAttribute* attrb ){
00405 
00406   // Get the xml node of the panel
00407   TiXmlNode* childNode = buttonNode->FirstChild( "Attribute" );
00408   if (childNode){
00409     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00410 
00411     // search the good attribute   
00412     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00413       const char* attrbName=child->Attribute("name");
00414 
00415       // We have the good button (xml)
00416       if (strcmp(attrbName, attrb->getName())==0){
00417 
00418         TiXmlText* textNode=child->FirstChild()->ToText();
00419         if (textNode){
00420           attrb->setValueStr(textNode->Value());
00421         }
00422       }
00423     }
00424   }
00425 }

00434 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::deleteSnapshot(const char* c){
00435   TiXmlElement* snapNode=this->getSnapshotNode(c);
00436   if (snapNode){
00437     bool b=root->RemoveChild(snapNode);
00438 
00439     if (b){
00440       doc->SaveFile();
00441       LOGI("Snapshot deleted successfully");
00442     }
00443     else
00444       LOGW("Cannot delete the snapshot");
00445 
00446   }
00447   else{
00448     LOGW("Cannot get the snapshot xml node to delete");
00449   }
00450 }

00457 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::setLastUse(const char* c){
00458   TiXmlNode* luNode = root->FirstChild( "LastUsed" );
00459   if (luNode){
00460     luNode->Clear();
00461     TiXmlText* textNode=new TiXmlText( c );
00462     luNode->LinkEndChild( textNode );
00463     doc->SaveFile();
00464   }
00465 }

00472 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::getLastUse(){
00473   const char* ret="";
00474 
00475   TiXmlNode* luNode = root->FirstChild( "LastUsed" );
00476   if (luNode){
00477     TiXmlElement* child= luNode->ToElement();
00478     TiXmlText* textNode=child->FirstChild()->ToText();
00479     if (textNode){
00480       ret=textNode->Value();
00481     }
00482   }
00483 
00484   return ret;
00485 }
